npcSpeech.text: You, yes you! Why do you look so sick and helpless? I don't know what you're up to here but the sooner you leave the happier I'll be. Strange things have been happening lately and we don't need any casualties. See that circle on the right? It will transport you onward.
I'm not here to look after Imps in trouble. Take a couple of seconds if you need it adn then leave.
How do you know Presbyter...? Regardless, if I tell you will you leave?
He is in charge of the facility here. he pioneered the Imphuman transformation technique. Now please leave.
If you don't you will regret it scum.
Leave now. I'm going to check that there's no one inside the facility.
Listen Imp, do not interfere with Gemtech security.
